title: Warehousing and support activities for transport (PKD 52)
paragraphs: Additional logistic services connected with road freight transport.
Short-term storage and cross-docking of goods in cooperation with partner warehouses.
Organisation of loading, unloading and transhipment along international corridors.
points: Coordination of warehouse services with external partners.
Support with customs-related logistics and temporary storage of goods.
Planning of loading windows and time slots to reduce waiting times.
